1000000111000011 0100101111101110 0 -> sum: 1100110110110001, cout: 0

1010001101001110 0111010110000101 1 -> sum: 0001100011010100, cout: 1
1110101000101110 1110110101000101 1 -> sum: 1101011101110100, cout: 1
